org.wikipedia

Class Wiki.Revision

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wikipedia.Wiki.Revision
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Wiki.Revision>
    Enclosing class:
    Wiki

    public class Wiki.Revision
extends Object
implements Comparable<Wiki.Revision>
    Represents a contribution and/or a revision to a page.
    Since:
    0.17

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Wiki.Revision(long revid, Calendar timestamp, String title, String summary, String user, boolean minor, boolean bot, boolean rvnew, int size)
      Constructs a new Revision object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wiki.Revision

        public Wiki.Revision(long revid,
             Calendar timestamp,
             String title,
             String summary,
             String user,
             boolean minor,
             boolean bot,
             boolean rvnew,
             int size)
        Constructs a new Revision object.
        Parameters:
        revid - the id of the revision (this is a long since {{NUMBEROFEDITS}} on en.wikipedia.org is now (January 2012) ~25% of Integer.MAX_VALUE
        timestamp - when this revision was made
        title - the concerned article
        summary - the edit summary
        user - the user making this revision (may be anonymous, if not use User.getUsername())
        minor - whether this was a minor edit
        bot - whether this was a bot edit
        rvnew - whether this revision created a new page
        size - the size of the revision
        Since:
        0.17

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public String getText()
               throws IOException
        Fetches the contents of this revision.
        Returns:
        the contents of the appropriate article at timestamp
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if page == Special:Log/xxx.
        Since:
        0.17

      • getRenderedText

        public String getRenderedText()
                       throws IOException
        Gets the rendered text of this revision.
        Returns:
        the rendered contents of the appropriate article at timestamp
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if page == Special:Log/xxx.
        Since:
        0.17

      • isContentDeleted

        public boolean isContentDeleted()
        Returns true if the revision content is RevisionDeleted. WARNING: the return value is meaningless until getRenderedText, getText or diff() is called because of MW api limitations.
        Returns:
        (see above)
        Since:
        0.31

      • diff

        public String diff(Wiki.Revision other)
            throws IOException
        Returns a HTML rendered diff table; see the table at the example.
        Parameters:
        other - another revision on the same page.
        Returns:
        the difference between this and the other revision
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.21

      • diff

        public String diff(String text)
            throws IOException
        Returns a HTML rendered diff table between this revision and the given text. Useful for emulating the "show changes" functionality. See the table at the example.
        Parameters:
        text - some wikitext
        Returns:
        the difference between this and the the text provided
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.21

      • diff

        public String diff(long oldid)
            throws IOException
        Returns a HTML rendered diff table; see the table at the example.
        Parameters:
        oldid - the oldid of a revision on the same page. NEXT_REVISION, PREVIOUS_REVISION and CURRENT_REVISION can be used here for obvious effect.
        Returns:
        the difference between this and the other revision
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.26

      • diff

        protected String diff(long oldid,
          String text)
               throws IOException
        Fetches a HTML rendered diff table; see the table at the example.
        Parameters:
        oldid - the id of another revision; (exclusive) or
        text - some wikitext to compare against
        Returns:
        a difference between oldid or text or null if there is no diff (example: 586849481).
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.21

      • isMinor

      • isBot

        public boolean isBot()
        Determines whether this revision was made by a bot.
        Returns:
        (see above)
        Since:
        0.23

      • isNew

        public boolean isNew()
        Determines whether this revision created a new page.
        WARNING: Will return false for all revisions prior to 2007 (I think?) -- this is a MediaWiki problem.
        WARNING: Returning true does not imply this is the bottommost revision on the page due to histmerges.
        WARNING: Not accessible through getPageHistory() -- a MW problem.
        Returns:
        (see above)
        Since:
        0.27

      • getSummary

        public String getSummary()
        Returns the edit summary for this revision, or null if the summary was RevisionDeleted and you lack the necessary privileges.
        Returns:
        the edit summary
        Since:
        0.17

      • isSummaryDeleted

        public boolean isSummaryDeleted()

        Returns:
        (see above)
        Since:
        0.30

      • getUser

        public String getUser()
        Returns the user or anon who created this revision. You should pass this (if not an IP) to getUser(String) to obtain a User object. Returns null if the user was RevisionDeleted and you lack the necessary privileges.
        Returns:
        the user or anon
        Since:
        0.17

      • setRcid

        public void setRcid(long rcid)
        Sets the rcid of this revision, used for patrolling. This parameter is optional. This is publicly editable for subclassing.
        Parameters:
        rcid - the rcid of this revision (long)
        Since:
        0.17

      • getRcid

        Sets a rollback token for this revision.
        Parameters:

        Since:
        0.24

      • getRollbackToken

        public String getRollbackToken()
        Gets the rollback token for this revision. Can be null, and often for good reasons: cannot rollback or not top revision.
        Returns:
        the rollback token
        Since:
        0.24

      • rollback

        public void rollback()
              throws IOException,
                     LoginException
        Reverts this revision using the rollback method. See Wiki.rollback().
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        CredentialNotFoundException - if not logged in or user is not an admin
        CredentialExpiredException - if cookies have expired
        AccountLockedException - if the user is blocked
        LoginException
        Since:
        0.19

      • rollback

        public void rollback(boolean bot,
            String reason)
              throws IOException,
                     LoginException
        Reverts this revision using the rollback method. See Wiki.rollback().
        Parameters:
        bot - mark this and the reverted revision(s) as bot edits
        reason - (optional) a custom reason
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        CredentialNotFoundException - if not logged in or user is not an admin
        CredentialExpiredException - if cookies have expired
        AccountLockedException - if the user is blocked
        LoginException
        Since:
        0.19
